metadata.title: Cigarra Foundation - Transforming Lives in Ciudad Bolívar
metadata.description: Since 2002, the Cigarra Foundation has served 180+ children with education, art, and culture programs in Ciudad Bolívar, Bogotá.

programs.subtitle: 14 education, art, and culture programs for the children of Ciudad Bolívar

donation.subtitle: With just $1.70 USD per day, a child receives nutritious meals

home.title: Cigarra Foundation - Transforming Lives in Ciudad Bolívar
home.description: Since 2002, the Cigarra Foundation has served 180+ children with education, art, and culture programs in Ciudad Bolívar, Bogotá.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about the mission, vision, and history of the Cigarra Foundation. Over 23 years transforming lives in Ciudad Bolívar.

programs.title: Programs
programs.description: 14 education, art, and culture programs for children and youth in Ciudad Bolívar, Bogotá.

howToHelp.title: How to Help
howToHelp.description: Discover how you can support the Cigarra Foundation: donations, child sponsorship, volunteering, and more.

news.title: News
news.description: Latest news and activities from the Cigarra Foundation in Ciudad Bolívar.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.description: Meet those whose lives have been transformed through the Cigarra Foundation programs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with the Cigarra Foundation. We are located in Ciudad Bolívar, Bogotá.

anthem.title: Foundation Anthem
anthem.description: Listen to the official Cigarra Foundation anthem, a symbol of hope and transformation.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the team of professionals and volunteers who make the Cigarra Foundation's work possible.

planPadrino.title: Sponsor a Child
planPadrino.description: Sponsor a child at the Cigarra Foundation and support their development throughout the year.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.description: Join the Cigarra Foundation as a volunteer. Share your talent and time with the children of Ciudad Bolívar.
